positions.title: Chief Information Officer (CIO)
positions.description:
Head of Group IT, Shared Services and Digital Projects

Strategic and operational responsibility for IT infrastructure, IT security, IT applications, ERP, CRM, OT and workplace solutions

Led the harmonization and standardization of IT processes at the Group level, driving increased efficiency

Fostered the automation and digitalization of business processes using AI and process mining

Evaluating and implementing new technologies e.g., AI to develop innovative business models

positions.title: Global Head of Manufacturing IT (Director)
positions.description:
Led and managed an international team across the US, Europe, Africa, and China

End-to-end responsibility for production-supporting systems, including MES, LIMS, and data management, ensuring compliance with GMP requirements

Maintained the validated status of all IT systems in strict accordance with regulatory requirements

Strategic SAP consulting for site managers, driving the optimization of operational processes

Evaluated and implemented new technologies, while automating and digitalizing production processes to drive efficiency improvements

positions.title: Head of Process IT & Technical Support
positions.description:
Managed the department with full budget responsibility

End-to-end responsibility for production-supporting IT and OT systems, IT infrastructure, and business-critical applications at the Penzberg site

Automated and digitalized site processes through the application of advanced analytics

Headed the maintenance and master data management workstream in the global SAP S/4HANA migration project
